MuteTabs - Simple Audio Control for Your Browser

MuteTabs is a lightweight Chrome extension that lets you easily manage audio across all your open tabs.

Mute/Unmute All Tabs: Quickly silence or restore sound with a single click.
Mute All Except Current Tab: Focus on the tab you're using by muting all others.
Global Volume Adjustment: Use the built-in volume slider to control the sound level across all tabs.
User-Friendly Interface: Access controls easily through a floating, draggable icon.
We're continually working to enhance MuteTabs. Your feedback is valuable to usâ€”please share your thoughts to help us improve!
